PHRASE.LANG: You've proven your fealty to House Thaon. You will always have the protection of this bodyguard whenever you choose. [#Legal]
Vous avez prouvé votre fidélité au Maison Thaon. Vous aurez toujours la protection de ce garde du corps chaque fois que vous choisissez.[#Legal]
Du hast deine Treue an das Haus Thaon. Sie haben immer den Schutz dieser Bodyguard, wenn Sie sich entscheiden.[#Legal]
Avete dimostrato la vostra fedeltà al Casa Thaon. Avrete sempre la protezione di questa guardia del corpo ogni volta che scegliete.[#Legal]
Has demostrado tu lealtad al Casa Thaon. Usted siempre tendrá la protección de este guardaespaldas siempre que quieras.[#Legal]
You've proven your fealty to House Thaon. You will always have the protection of this bodyguard whenever you choose. [#Legal]
You've proven your fealty to House Thaon. You will always have the protection of this bodyguard whenever you choose. [#Legal]
